metadata.final_prompt:
Build a Spotify-like frontend using React.
Build tool: Vite
Styling: Tailwind CSS
State management: React Context
No backend.

project_root/frontend/framework/react.reason: Condition not satisfied: Frontend framework is React

project_root/frontend/framework/vue.reason: Condition not satisfied: Frontend framework is Vue

project_root/frontend/routing/react_rout.reason: Condition not satisfied: Routing uses React Router

project_root/frontend/routing/file_based.reason: Condition not satisfied: Routing uses file-based strategy

project_root/frontend/state_management/r.reason: Condition not satisfied: State management is Redux

project_root/frontend/state_management/z.reason: Condition not satisfied: State management is Zustand

project_root/frontend/state_management/c.reason: Condition not satisfied: Only React Context is used

project_root/frontend/styling/css_module.reason: Condition not satisfied: Styling uses CSS Modules

project_root/frontend/styling/tailwind.reason: Condition not satisfied: Styling uses Tailwind CSS

project_root/backend/runtime/node.reason: Condition not satisfied: Backend runtime is Node.js

project_root/backend/runtime/django.reason: Condition not satisfied: Backend runtime is Python

project_root/deployment/docker.reason: Condition not satisfied: Deployment uses Docker

project_root/deployment/serverless.reason: Condition not satisfied: Deployment is serverless
